deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 8 hrs 43 mins
features: Fits most 26-60 Inch TVs：Please verify TV VESA (the mounting hole patterns of tv back) within 75*75mm to 400*400mm and TV less than weight 99lbs. Up to 16 inch wood stud spacing.
Reduce Glare: -9º tilt Angle adjustment helps to prevent reflections and glare.
Saving Space: TV wall mount frees up so much floor space when your TV is on the wall.（TV back 1.3" away from the wall.）
Quick lock and release: Quick disconnect pull straps help to easily remove the TV from the mount.

US-Based Customer Service: Buy with confidence, we provide 10-year after-sales service. Not sure this mount will work?? Please let us know the Complete TV models. Warm tips: If you need 10X50mm concrete anchors, please let us know to get it.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: More for Your Choice TV Mount for 42-86in TVs Add to Cart Universal Soundbar Mount Add to Cart TV Mount for 37-86in TVs Add to Cart TV Mount for 37"-82" TVs Add to Cart TV Mount for 32"-70" TVs Add to Cart Customer Reviews 4.7 out of 5 stars 3,154 4.5 out of 5 stars 435 4.7 out of 5 stars 614 4.7 out of 5 stars 623 4.7 out of 5 stars 722 Price $41.99$41.99 $29.99$29.99 $54.99$54.99 $26.99$26.99 $47.99$47.99 Move Type Full Motion Soundbar Mount Full Motion Fixed Full Motion TV Size 42''-86'' / 37''-86'' 37"-82" 32"-70" Max Load 120lbs 13lbs 132lbs 132lbs 110lbs Max VESA 600x400mm 600x400mm 600x400mm 600x400mm 400x400mm Tilt Angle +5°/-15° / +5°/-15° / +5°/-15° Swivel Angle ±45° / ±45° / ±45° Extend 2.76"-15.18" 3.4''-6.06" 15.18" / 3.34"-15.07" Fit Studs Spacing Up to 16" Up to 24" Up to 16" Up to 24" Up to 15.07"

How can I check if the TV mount is suitable for my TV? 1 Weight up to 99 LBS 2 VESA pattern, max 400x400mm, min 75x75mm 3 Wall Types : Up to 16‘’ wood wtuds and solid brick/concrete wall. How to configure VESA holes? VESA= horizontal x vertical distance (the four holes on the back of the TV) What kinds of wall type can the tv mount be mounted on? 8‘’-16‘’ Wood studs and solid brick and concrete wall.（DO NOT MOUNT ON DRYWALL ALONE） Are screws included? All standard mounting hardware included(TV Screws, Spacers, Washers, Lag bolt, Allen key), bubble level and clear instruction, easy installation. The concrete anchors are send per request, size 10x50mm.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what we needed!
reviews.reviewText: This is exactly what we needed. We got a tv for our patio and needed a simple tv mount and this did the trick. It helps that it’s inexpensive. But the quality doesn’t feel cheap at all. It was easy to install and came with everything we needed.If you need a good and simple tv mount I highly recommend this one!!

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great TV Wall Mount
reviews.reviewText: Its easy to install, It is very sturdy, its holding a 50 inch tv with NO problems, So easy to assemble it. Comes to together in no time, and you can't beat the price point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install
reviews.reviewText: This mount is easy to install and sturdy. Works great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A well designed mount for a good price
reviews.reviewText: The supplied lag bolts are hefty and long enough to secure the frame very firmly to studs. The assembly screws are quality. I like that they included a variety of spacers and screws to fit different TVs. I ended up using two of the remaining spacers to mount my soundbar. Hanging the TV was easier than expected, but I used a spotter to look from the side to make sure I was hooking the TV to the frame properly. I used this with a 55 inch TV and it is very secure. Make sure you attach your TV cables and power cord before mounting because there is not enough room once the TV is mounted to attach cables. I ended up taking my TV down and installing my three HDMI, one eArc, LAN, and power cables before hanging it again. As my plug is on the wall behind the TV I needed to plug that in prior to mounting as well. I should have thought it through ahead of time, but taking the TV down, than hanging it back up again was easy enough. Also, the instructions are very easy to follow.The tilt function is easy to adjust and tighten after mounting, but I used a long handled allen wrench instead of the short one provided to improve access. Overall, this is a well designed and well made mount with the capacity to hold my 55 inch TV securely and safely.When I purchased this mount I also purchased another one that had good reviews. After looking at how it gets installed and at the maximum weight it supports I sent it back and used this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple and perfect mount
reviews.reviewText: The hardest part of the install of this mount was finding the stud in my wall with my wall finder haha. Once I found my studs, this went up in less than 10 minutes. It's very straightforward, the instructions are very clear. There's plenty of parts in the bag to connect various types of TV backings and wall attachments. And at the price of it too! Will be buying again if I ever need to mount another TV.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my needs
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install, tv fits great on it. Perfect for our needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I am not a handy person... but...
reviews.reviewText: This thing was so easy to install. I found some studs, I lined up a couple holes, and drilled the frame in. The bars lined up with the back of my TV easily, and then I just lifted the TV and clipped it on. All by myself! They provide you with so many different options for screws depending on your use case as well.If you're torn on what mount to get, just get this one :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We have 2, 1 holding a 55 and 1 holding a 32. Great product for the price.
